schema_mapping.description: Mapping between RAVDESS emotions and Voxcentia psychological dimensions

emo5.description: State of calm, rest, and ease

personality_trait_approach.note: Personality traits (char1-char94) require different training data
personality_trait_approach.recommendation: Current models provide baseline estimates based on vocal patterns
personality_trait_approach.future_improvement: Require dataset with personality trait labels for accurate training

current_model_limitations.emotion_accuracy: Moderate - 7/26 emotions have direct RAVDESS mappings
current_model_limitations.trait_accuracy: Limited - personality traits inferred from vocal patterns without direct training labels
current_model_limitations.recommendation: Results provide directional insights but should not be considered clinically accurate

next_steps: Keep original mapping for semantic reference
Document model limitations in API responses
Map RAVDESS emotions to closest Voxcentia equivalents
